member.name: T:DG.DeInspektorEditor.AttributesManagers.DeListPropertyDrawer
member.summary: Note: this propertyDrawer is called only if the list is expanded in the array and has at least one element, and is called for each list element

member.name: T:DG.DeInspektorEditor.DeInspektor
member.summary: Used to draw special method attributes. If you need another generic inspector, inherit from this and override DoEnable, DoDisable and OnInspectorGUI.
